item.title: The Ice After the Fire: Why Caracas Was Just the Warm-Up for Nuuk
item.description: By mid-morning on Saturday, the language being used about Caracas had already started to harden into something dangerous: ‘capture’, ‘removal’, ‘operation’. On Truth Social, President Donald Trump claimed that US forces had taken Nicol√°s Maduro and his wife into custody and flown them out of Venezuela. In the vacuum that followed, Venezuela’s own vice-president admitted she did not know where Maduro was, or even whether he was still alive.
